flags.text: This project guide will not appear in search results but can still be viewed by anyone!

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Build your own Sensor Station. See where your plain if flying and how fast. Fully opensource software and hardware. Build your own of build a complete DIY kit. See http://www.d68.nl/sensorboard
guide.introduction_rendered: Build your own Sensor Station. See where your plain if flying and how fast. Fully opensource software and hardware. Build your own of build a complete DIY kit. See http://www.d68.nl/sensorboard
guide.summary: A DIY fully opensource telemetry sensor station to interface with Hitec's Aurora A9 2.4GHz remote controls. Compatible with GPS devices available from diydrones.com http://www.d68.nl/sensorboard
guide.title: DIY Hitec Aurora A9 Sensor Station
